message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly benefit your endeavors. Given its immense value to you, we propose an initial offer of $1100000. This price reflects our commitment to providing exceptional quality while also ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. We are confident that this product will exceed your expectations and contribute greatly to your success. Should you require more information or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value of your product,  $1100000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at the moment. To move forward, I'd be willing to pay $1050000.  This would be a fair price for both of us, allowing for a mutually beneficial transaction. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to engage in discussions. Our product indeed carries significant value, and we aim to ensure a fair transaction for both parties. In light of your offer, I am pleased to counter with a proposal of $1075000 for the product. This price reflects our commitment to maintaining a high-quality standard while also being mindful of your budget constraints. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations and facilitates a successful negotiation. Please let me know if you require further clarification or have any concerns.
